I am an Assistant Professor in the [Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering](http://www.ece.arizona.edu/) at [The University of Arizona](http://www.arizona.edu/), where I perform research in data mining and applied machine learning.

- __PhD__ Electrical Engineering, [Drexel University](https://drexel.edu/), 2015
- __MSc__ Electrical and Computer Engineering, [Rowan University](http://rowan.edu/), 2011
- __BSc__ Electronics Engineering Technology, [The Pennsylvania College of Technology](https://www.pct.edu/), 2008
